com.deezer.sdk.player.event

Interface OnBufferErrorListener


  • public interface OnBufferErrorListener
    Defines the behavior of a listener of the buffer's errors. It will be notified of the any error that happens in the buffer's lifecycle.
    Author:
    Deezer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBufferError(java.lang.Exception ex, double percent)
      Callback method that will be called when an exception occurs inside the BufferManager.

    • Method Detail

      • onBufferError

        void onBufferError(java.lang.Exception ex,
                 double percent)
        Callback method that will be called when an exception occurs inside the BufferManager.
        Parameters:
        ex - the exception that caused an error.
        percent - the percentage of data buffered when the exception occured.
